about_the_game:
Your home world’s been raided one too many times. Perhaps there’s some resources the raiders want, or they just needed something to fight. Either way, you’ve had enough. You purchase an old, small command ship and take to the stars, buying whatever equipment you can get on the way. Your goal? To conquer and pacify the stars.

Idle Space Navy is an idle/incremental game currently in active development by Phoenix Aura, developed as a spiritual successor to Idle Space Raider and Transport Defender by Yaroslav ‘IDNoise’ Nikityshev with their permission. Assume command of your ship, patrol space, defeat enemies, collect resources, and increase your power by upgrading and purchasing ships, weapons, and more.

As of version 0.10.7, Idle Space Navy currently includes the following:

  • Purchase and position your ships on the map grid, then outfit your ships with your choice of weapons.
    • 7 ship types currently implemented.
    • 10 weapons in 3 types currently implemented.
  • Use credits to upgrade the power of your ships, boosting their damage output.
  • Refine scrap fragments into metal ingots in the Foundry, and upgrade even further or buy new items in the Shipyard.
  • Reset to earn Calibration Chips, then use them to unlock and upgrade item types and boost your fleet through the Laboratory.
  • Fit your ships with Modules to boost their performance over a short period.
  • Automate boosting your active ships’ levels as well as that of your Shipyard upgrades.
  • When you advance far enough, collect Artifact Fragments to trade with alien powers and boost your fleet even more!
  • Earn daily rewards just for playing the game!
  • Earn progress to keep your fleet advancing even when you're offline!
